what_you_do: Luvvie Ajayi Jones is a bestselling author, speaker, and book coach who helps people find their courage, speak their truth, and make positive change.
who_you_serve: Aspiring authors, speakers, and professionals looking to make an impact through their work.
offering: Luvvie provides guidance, strategies, and support to help her clients write books, deliver impactful speeches, and lead with courage.
social_proof: Luvvie is a four-time New York Times bestselling author, and her TED talk has over 9 million views.
signature_programs: Luvvie's books include "Professional Troublemaker", "I'm Judging You", "Rising Troublemaker", and "Little Troublemaker". She also founded The Book Academy to help aspiring authors write and publish their books.
business_focus: Helping people find their courage, speak their truth, and make positive change through writing, speaking, and personal development.
service_provided: Bestselling books, speaking, book coaching, online courses
